title: FontCreator Pro 7.5.0.519
description:
This application creates your own signature, logo and handwriting.

The Font Creator software brings font creation within reach of the average PC user level, future typographers and graphic designers.
This font editor you can create and edit TrueType fonts. You can use the modified fonts in Windows 3.11 and higher. Features include the ability to convert (scanned) bitmaps (.bmp files) to TrueType outlines, allowing you to create your own signature, logo and handwriting.
The modified fonts can be saved and then used in popular word processing programs and text illustration.
The editor lets you easily select any installed font, showing all possible options with descriptions of every letter, number and special character.
Once perfected your work of art, a click on the toolbar of the program will install to your source.
